features: EXTRA-ABSORBENT: The high-quality sponge is made from a high-quality, cellulose-coated sponge that absorbs plenty of water to soak up any mess
LIBMAN GATOR MOP: This includes 3 replacement heads for the Libman Gator Mop, one of the many high-quality, effective mops Libman offers
USE ALL OVER THE HOUSE: This mop can be used on most surfaces in your home – tile, wood, laminate, stone, and is Easy to Replace - Just snap the old one off, and click the new one on
HIGH QUALITY SPONGE: Our sponges are made from high-quality manufacturing processes that ensure it doesn’t tear easily and lasts through all your toughest cleanings
MADE IN THE USA: We proudly manufacture this product and the Libman Gator Mop in the USA
LIBMAN 3020 GATOR MOP: There are 3 Total Versions of the Gator Mop. This Refill is for the Standard #3020 Libman Gator Mop. NOT the Big Gator Mop or the High Power Gator Mop
body.description: The Libman Gator Mop Refill kit comes with 3 mop refills, all made from high quality materials in the USA. The Gator Mop Head is easily changed and has a wide scrubbing surface to help you easily and effectively scrub all your floors. The mop head is meant for use with the Libman Gator Mop only

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Libman Cleaning Tools The Libman Company has been manufacturing quality cleaning tools in the U.S. since 1896. With the corporate headquarters just feet away from the manufacturing plant, we are able to closely oversee the quality on our products. Our team carefully inspects all raw materials coming into the plant and all finished goods out the door to ensure that you receive the highest quality cleaning products. The Libman Company has a long history as a family owned and operated business and is currently managed by the 4th generation of the Libman family. Libman is a strong brand with distribution across the United States, Canada, and many other countries. Libman is doing its part - by installing 2,600 solar panels we create 1 million kW of solar power annually. Our brooms are made using recycled water bottles and PET plastic. Each year, Libman saves 12,000 trees, 5 million gallons of water, and 9,000 gallons of oil as a result of its environmental focus.
Gator Mop Refill Head The Gator Mop Refills will keep your mop cleaning fresh across your kitchen, bathroom, dining room, and more!

reviews.reviewerName: Mr.John Frame & Mrs. Mrs. Ruth Frame
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What's the big issue I see nothing wrong with the Libman 1487 Gator Mop Refill Pack
reviews.reviewText: When I saw that the sponge I use for my mop is labeled a "Frequently Returned" item, I was surprised. I believe this is the only sponge that fits my mop, which leads me to believe that the mop is also frequently returned. However, I am confused as to why people are returning the sponge. While it requires a bit of effort to scrub the floors with it, that is the case with any mop. With any mop, all you do is push the dirt around. I use this mop and sponge for quick cleanups, but for more thorough cleaning, I prefer to use a bucket, scrub brush, rag, and toothbrush for the baseboards and cracks. I have been using this mop and sponge for the past seven years, and I have never had any issues with it. You need to rinse the floors after mopping to ensure you don't push the dirt around, but that is the case with any mop.I am curious to read the reviews to find out why the sponge is frequently returned. However, since I have been using it for so long, I am just going to purchase it again. I only use the mop on days when I don't have enough time to do a thorough cleaning. If my memory serves me right, at one time they did offer this mop in two sizes. The mop I have is the smaller of the two, and I don't think they make the larger one anymore. Therefore, it is possible that the sponge is being returned because people who have the larger mop keep buying it in hopes that it will fit their mop, even though it won't. If you have the smaller of the two mops, this is the mop head for you. Don't hesitate to buy it because it says "frequently returned." This mop head is very durable and holds up well, as long as you clean it after each use and do not use bleach on it. It is one of the best mop heads available on the market, and for the price, it is a great value.
